title: Error Code 004
body:
This thing seems to have a consistant popup at random moments in my download of the patch. The first time it was at 34%, then 79%, then 68%.

What I've tried:

* Running as Admin
* Restarting Computer/Client
* Tried a Full Repair
* Re-download of Client for a fresh Install
* Disabling Firewall
* Forcing a Re-patch

Only two things I haven't tried yet and are in the process of trying is manually installing the .Net Framework, and Disabling the UAC (though since i'm the only client on said PC with no side ones this might seem rather redundant).

Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: This specific error usually happens if your game files don't have permission to be read or used.  You've done some solid steps so far, but I recommend at least for now focusing on security settings.  Run through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide and double check your antivirus to make sure league is added as an exception.
